AnalyserNodeFftSize.summary: The fftSize property of the interface is an unsigned long value and represents the window size in samples that is used when performing a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) to get frequency domain data.
AnalyserNodeFftSize.value: An unsigned integer, representing the window size of the FFT, given in number of samples. A higher value will result in more details in the frequency domain but fewer details in the amplitude domain.Must be a power of 2 between 25 and 215, so one of: 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 16384, and 32768. Defaults to 2048.
